strapiPost.title: With Incredible Sushi, Fresh Seafood, and Creative Dishes, Blu Rogers is a Must Try
strapiPost.content:
Located in a place that is likely familiar to longtime Rogers residents, Blu Rogers recently opened in Downtown Rogers in the old City Hall building.

  • Top chef: A sister restaurant to Blu in Bentonville, Blu Rogers prides itself on having the highest quality and purest tasting fish and seafood. Familiar with the concept, we checked out this location for the first time last week for lunch!
  • Served up: We went with the Blu specials - udon soup, seasoned shishito peppers, ahi tuna salad, and the fiery whipple roll. While there are plenty of great options for dinner at Blu DTR, this was the perfect combo for our lunch there.

If you like seafood, Blu Rogers should definitely be on your list, because they do it right! Learn more about Blu Rogers HERE.
